name: In Mirror Worlds
description:
Can you solve puzzles in two worlds at once? In Mirror Worlds is a minimalist, grid-based puzzle game that will challenge you to think in parallel!

Features:

  • 140 hand-designed levels
  • 7 different worlds with unique puzzle twists
  • Beautiful minimalist designs based on nature
  • Relaxing soundtrack to listen to while you play
  • Built-in feedback system to suggest new worlds and features
  • Use the arrow keys or swipe with your mouse/finger

Get the mobile version on iOS and Android! All proceeds (from donations and purchases of the mobile apps alike) will be donated to two environmental charities to help keep the planet healthy and safe: the Clean Air Task Force and Earthworks.
